title: She's in Charge
overview: You might know Veronica "Pooh" Nash-Poleate from her viral video "Don't Go in the Shark's House." (If you haven't seen it, you must go watch it!) Ever since becoming a viral sensation, fans have been reaching out to Pooh for advice. She's a school guidance counselor with degrees in psychology and education-- making it something she not only has a passion for, but is also trained to do. Though she loves the online conversations with her loyal fans, Pooh's decided it is time to hit the road and meet them in person. On TLC's new show, She's in Charge, she'll be making house calls - giving advice and spreading love every step of the way.
